name: Herbert P. Bear
description:
Left-click to shoot red fish

Right-click to shoot blue fish

Aim with mouse

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Herbert P. Bear is a game I made back in 2018 back when I still didn't know how to make games, and this is the original version, bugs and all. So, why am I posting it here? For two reasons.

One is to act as a portfolio piece. I think it's good to show where you started and how much you've grown.

Another is that I have a sort of affinity for this game. Despite being super simple, it might be one of my favorite games conceptually. Maybe I'll remake it one day.

If you're wondering why Herbert P. Bear from Club Penguin is shooting condiment bottles full of fish at elderly faces on a lonely iceberg, too bad.

Just kidding I'll tell you.

If you Google Herbert P. Bear, go to the images tab, and scroll down long enough you will find a very out-of-place image of this elderly man amongst the many, true, Herbert P. Bears (Apparently, it's from a Drawception game where someone forgot who Herbert P. Bear was. I know, how could they). There can only be one real Herbert P. Bear, so they must fight to the death.  As for the fish, I don't know. Use your imagination.

I am not affiliated with Club Penguin or Disney, this is just a fun little fangame.
